title: Dari-phil
author: Dari-phil
content: Good morning to you all my naija people. I registered a year ago but couldn't meet with all the forums activities due to Ill health I was battling with for 9 months. But am better now and am seeking all your support in guiding me through the activities of the forum so that I can succeed like all of the great minds here. Thank you all. Humbly waiting for your guidance please

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: You are welcome, Dari-phil.You can read the rules of our local board: Unofficial General Guidelines For Posting( Na de koko dem). You will also see the link of the rules of this forum, make sure you read it as well.To know about merit and activity: Merit & new rank requirementsDo not spam. Do not plagiarize. Do not come with low quality posts. Read very well about some threads and have idea of how we are posting.

comments.author: Coyster
comments.body: Sorry about your health, and i hope say you dey stronger now; welcome. As the user above me don post, you suppose read those links wey him drop, e go help you understand as things dey work for this forum. The rules of the forum no dey hard to follow, but e dey easy for person to break am if dem no really get the understanding.I know say na Bitcoin knowledge carry you come, so you go dey read threads around the forum, if e get any particular thing wey you wan learn, use the search button to see if e get when dem don discuss am before, if e no dey, then you fit start your own topic, either for our local board, or for the English board. As you be newbie so ehn, the best thing you go fit do na to dey read more than you dey post, e go help you garner sufficient knowledge.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: Welcome to bitcointalk platform and sorry about your health situation, you will be fine. I will advise you work with ease here looking at your health situation. Do well to give attention to your health till full recovery while doing that, you can be reading and commenting  based on the limit you can for the day as your strength can carry. I see Charles-Tim has already given you some clues and links for which you can start with to keep you a bit active and regular. I will suggest you read through so as to gain insight on how to go about activities here. It would guide you through to making sure you are on the right track.

comments.author: Agbe
comments.body: Thank God for your recovering and coming back to the forum. I believed u go know small things for di forum even though no be all. And I will also like you to read what Charles-Tim as dropped and I will also like to add this for you to read.  What is Bitcoin Op for now read more than posting. Take your time to read articles and ask questions like this one so that people will contribute for you to progress. And always post on the area and board you are good with. If you are not too good in the general boards then post in the local board more than the English boards. And as you advance in the local board then you can do well for the general boards because naija board is synonymous to English boards.

comments.author: Nheer
comments.body: Quote from: Dari-phil on August 11, 2023, 08:34:25 AMGood morning to you all my naija people. I registered a year ago but couldn't meet with all the forums activities due to Ill health I was battling with for 9 months. But am better now and am seeking all your support in guiding me through the activities of the forum so that I can succeed like all of the great minds here. Thank you all. Humbly waiting for your guidance pleaseYou are very welcome and i am glad you are now feeling better. The forum na just a discussion forum where you go learn a lot about bitcoin and cryptocurrency and e get rules just like every forum de get and as Charlse-Tim and others don tell you just try make you follow the rules wey de here and gradually you go understand how dem de do things here. But the way you talk am say you wan succeed so, this place no be school or where dem go fail or pass person, na just discussion forum where u go just de put mouth and add to discussions and when you make better post any body fit just reward u. My advice be say make u no put am for head say you rank up just take your time de follow up discussions and with time you sef go sabi and as u de drop quality post u go begin de grow gradually.

comments.author: GiftedMAN
comments.body: Welcome back to the forum mate and I hope you are much better right now to continue with your daily activities? Everything about the forum is simple you just need to dedicated your time and put in mental efforts to go round the board to read the post made by other members that alone can fasten your learning and help you to also contribute positively inline with the threads you will come across. Take time to open the link that has been provided by charles-Tim so you understand how the other things work here and as he has earlier informed you, do not copy the work of someone else without referencing the person or sharing the link where it was copied from so you don't put yourself in to trouble.As a beginner you may find it difficult to make quality post so I will advise that you focus more on reading first instead of making low quality post that may not be seen as meaningful, going to the beginners and help section can help you to learn few things especially some questions that has been asked and answered by members so try reading more post there and make more research too to be sure of the information you see, good luck.

Humbly waiting for your guidance pleaseMy brother welcome back to the forum, how is your health now, hope say u don better right? Make you take care of yourself oooo, our health dey very important so make we take care of ourselves. No worry plenty people dey dis local board wey go fit help you with everything wey u need, one person wey dey ahead of me don drop rules give u, incase if u get any question, kindly ask here and plenty people dey here wey ready to help u, and high rank people wey dey hear u get their support. Dey get some common mistakes wey people dey make for dis forum and na plagiarism, if you dey post make sure say na u write d post urself, and if u dey copy am from anywhere, make sure say u add source link, also dey get Wetin people dey use post again wey be AI, Abeg make sure say u avoid am, anything wey u dey write make sure say na u dey use ur own hand type am, na things wey I see say e fit easily spoil ur account for forum now be that.

Humbly waiting for your guidance pleaseWell I think I still have to welcome you on board and I believe  say, you suppose done waka round the forum even though you never make better post, and as a newbie, it is always advisable that you spend  more time reading  than wanting to write because you go later get all the time you desire to write anm the things you wish to write.And try make you stick to the beginners and help  board as there is one of the places you can get all the necessary  guidelines that you desire and the truth is that you shouldn't see the forum as a tight place but rather a community  where freedom  of speech  is highly practiced.

comments.author: Out of mind
comments.body: It is really sad that you may have struggled with your illness for a long time, 9 months e no easy. u are healthy now so congratulations on your form and wish you long life. You are a newbie which may not have a good idea about the forum but if you spend time you will surely get the idea. And many of you have already told me to check out the guides that are out there for newbies. And take care of your health regularly, you will be mentally healthy and able to spend time with the forum. You too much!

comments.author: Sim_card
comments.body: OP, I am happy that after facing some health challenge and overcoming it,you have decided to come back to the forum to continue with learning. You should read all pinned thread on Beginners and Help board and any other board of your interest so that you can learn fast. Dedicate more time to reading and post less,do your own research on any information that you want to get to be very sure of it. I wish you the best and good luck on your journey here on bitcointalk. Whatever that you don't  understand, feel free to ask us here and you will get the answer ASAP.
